## html.SourceAttrsOptions type

Options for `getSourceAttrs` and `withSourceAttrs`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type SourceAttrsOptions = Prettify<Omit<SourceAttrs, 'height' | 'src' | 'width'> & WithSrcSetBuilder>;
```

**References:** [SourceAttrs](./yoot.jsx.sourceattrs.md)<!-- -->, [WithSrcSetBuilder](./yoot.jsx.withsrcsetbuilder.md)

## Remarks

Allows `HTMLSourceAttributes` with an optional `srcSetBuilder` function.
